document_data.name: Iodine
document_data.mainbody: '''Iodine''' was an elemental material found in the [[Realms]].
document_data.Availability: In {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}, the [[Elemental Store]] of [[Karsus Enclave]] sold pure elemental iodine for 13 [[gp]] per {{SI|1|ounce|long=yes}}.
document_data.Usages:
* Iodine was used in various [[poison]]s as well as medicines.
* ''[[Cloudburst]]'' used powdered iodine crystals and powdered [[silver]] as [[material component]]s.{{Cite dragon/71/From the Sorcerer's Scroll|7}}{{Cite dragon/67/From the Sorcerer's Scroll|54}}
* Iodine blocked [[Geomantic]] [[divination]], and the sb'a, thmn, and tsn [[geoglyph]]s were weakened by proximity to iodine.
* The magical tome ''[[Lions of Tomorrow]]'' had [[parchment]] consisting of [[seaweed]] soaked in a solution of iodine in order to avoid Geomantic divination.
